sentences.en: Behind the words, at once self - pitying and vainglorious , the merits of the case were overwhelming.
sentences.cn: 在那些既是顾影自怜而又 自命不凡 的字眼后面, 事情本身的是非曲直是无可争辩的.

sentences.en: Behind the words, at once self-pitying and vainglorious, the merits of the case were overwhelming.
sentences.cn: 在那些既是顾影自怜而又自命不凡的字眼后面，事情本身的是非曲直是无可争辩的。

sentences.en: Gal.5:26 Let us not become vainglorious, provoking one another, envying one another.
sentences.cn: 加五26不要贪图虚荣,彼此惹气, 互相嫉妒.

sentences.en: He was silent for a minute , casting about for the least vainglorious way in which to express himself.
sentences.cn: 他沉默了一会儿，想找到个最不虚荣的方式表达自己的意思。

trans.tran_cn: 非常自负的，虚荣心强的，爱虚荣
trans.tran_en: too proud of your own abilities, importance etc
